eightdegrees 0.3.1

    eightdegrees

    eightdegrees.Rmd

    Installation

    install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jebbd/eightdegrees",build_vignettes = TRUE)
    library(eightdegrees)
library(ggplot2)
library(colorBlindness)
library(dplyr)

    Munro Series

    8 colour paired palette based on the limited edition Munro series 

    ggplot(iris,aes(x=Sepal.Width,y=Sepal.Length,colour=Species))+
  geom_point(size=2)+
  scale_colour_munro()+
  theme_minimal()

    Core Range

    6 colour palette based on the core range from 8 degrees brewing

    ggplot(iris,aes(x=Species,y=Sepal.Width,fill=Species))+
  geom_violin()+
  scale_fill_core_range()+
  theme_minimal()

    Unfortunately these palettes are not colourblind safe
    But if you request two colours from either palette the returned pair is a colourblind safe blue and orange.

    cvdPlot(swatch,layout = c("origin", "deuteranope", 
                     "protanope","desaturate"))
